@treylorswift @MatthewGMonroe @jack @danprimack @elonmusk same as it ever was. but better than only one view.
@davidgoldberg @danprimack @jack @elonmusk ideally

@davidgoldberg @danprimack @jack @elonmusk there should be no curation or moderation in the protocol. there should be a vibrant client ecosystem where all of that lives and that gives users the option to choose which flavor of Twitter they want
@Kantrowitz @jack @danprimack @elonmusk each client will have their own curation, moderation, filtering, etc. so it depends on the client you choose to use
@kevinmarks @danprimack @jack @elonmusk Different time and in hindsight a big mistake

@danprimack @jack @elonmusk Truth Social should be a Twitter client. That way Trump can get back on Twitter and reach any and all of his followers who want to use the Truth Social client to follow him.
@Wertwhile It would be great if the Citibike app showed which kiosks have them. I'm quite eager to give them a try.
